text:
In a house burglary, 30 sovereigns of gold jewellery and half a kg of silver articles were stolen from the house of a bank manager at Mukondapalli during the weekend.

According to the complaint, Senthil along with family went to Erode on a personal visit and returned on Sunday night. He found the front door of his house open and the valuables missing. The SIPCOT police are investigating the case.
title: Valuables stolen from house
